hero.description: This site is about me, Olesea Kolomiets, a master chocolatier, taster, and creator of the chocolate and confectionery mastery school. I share knowledge, inspire creativity, and help to understand the art of chocolate more deeply. My courses are suitable for confectioners, restaurateurs, children, and anyone who wants to learn to work with chocolate. Join, create masterpieces, and find your style in the confectionery world!

intro.first: I am a master chocolatier, professional taster, teacher, and creator of the creative school of chocolate and confectionery mastery. For several years, I have been teaching confectioners and enthusiasts around the world not only to create unique and amazing treats but also to believe in themselves.
intro.second: I have proven that even without artistic or special education, you can learn to paint on cakes, sculpt delicate flowers, create complex chocolate compositions, and most importantly, inspire others. Everyone is talented and can master anything they sincerely desire if they let go of fears and doubts.
intro.third: Once, I just picked up a tool without knowing how to use it properly. Continuous learning and practice changed my world – and the world of my students. Today, my desserts and chocolates are recognizable, they are given to dear people, honored guests, and celebrities. They have been tasted by presidents, consuls, world musicians, and the chocolate itself has traveled to the most prestigious corners of the world.
intro.fourth: In my workshops and courses, I have seen many times how people rediscover themselves, realize their capabilities, and gain confidence. Everyone can create delicious and unique masterpieces! And if it seems too difficult – don't worry, I will help you find the right approach that will make your path to chocolate art easy and inspiring!

faq.description: Everything you need to know about DELICE's chocolate making courses and workshops.

format.question: What is the format of the chocolate making course?
format.answer: The course consists of 4 modules (lessons) of 4-5 hours each or 2 full days. We combine theoretical knowledge with practice in an interactive format. Each lesson includes instructor demonstrations followed by hands-on exercises under guidance.

attention.question: Is individual attention provided during training?
attention.answer: Yes, we give maximum attention to each participant. Training is conducted individually or in small groups of 2-3 people to ensure personalized guidance and support.

experience.question: Is experience required to participate in the course?
experience.answer: No, our course is suitable for both beginners and experienced confectioners. We adapt the program depending on the participants' level of preparation.

materials.question: Are materials and ingredients provided?
materials.answer: Yes, all necessary materials and ingredients are provided. You don't need to bring anything with you except the desire to learn and create.

booking.question: How to book a place in the course?
booking.answer: You can book a place on our website by filling out the registration form. After booking confirmation, you will receive all necessary instructions and information.

practice.question: Will there be an opportunity to practice after the course?
practice.answer: Yes, we provide access to additional materials and recipes for self-practice. You can also sign up for our advanced workshops to deepen your knowledge and skills.

AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.meetOlesea: We are not just a school, we are a space of inspiration, taste, and true mastery!

bio.part1: Here, chocolate turns into art, desserts become design masterpieces, and every student becomes a creator of unique masterpieces.
bio.part2:
Who is our school for?
 ✔ Professional confectioners who want to reach a new level and master complex techniques.
 ✔ Enthusiasts and home cooks dreaming of creating restaurant desserts in their kitchen.
 ✔ Productions, cafes, and restaurants striving to surprise guests with signature sweets.
 ✔ Children, to whom we will give the magic of the chocolate world and develop their creative abilities.

philosophy.part1: We conduct group and individual classes, online courses, tastings, and live workshops. You can learn in a convenient format, whether it's working in the studio, in your own kitchen, or in a professional confectionery.
philosophy.part2: Unique treats, chocolate compositions, and desserts that you not only want to eat but also admire! True celebrations of taste and creativity, where every student reveals their talents. New creative masters of chocolate and confectionery art who create boldly, brightly, and confidently!
